Subject: There Is No Escape

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod ran up besides Feline. He fired two missiles at the retreating
bots.
"Run you rusted pieces of scrap!"

::War Machine::

The huge gestalt shook the ground, as he moved into position.
He sprayed the enemy with plasma charges. Retreating or not.

OOC: Just incase you are confused. When KSL's, Zardus's, and my War
Machine charrs are in gestalt mode, War Machine can be controled by each
of us.
